stories.title: Show HN: MongoDB ObjectID to Timestamp and Vice Versa
Memecoin Faithful Aren’t Laughing Anymore with Prices Crashing
Tool by security researchers checks a website's protection against clickjacking

stories.text:
As defined by all the companies claiming to be building one, do you see any redeeming qualities in the metaverse or is this just a marketing play?

From what I've read it seems all too dystopian to me so I'm wondering if there's anything redeeming about the concept that I'm just not seeing.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are there any actual redeeming qualities of the metaverse concept?
Ads may be coming to KDE

stories.text: I’m an architect by formal education and I’ve been working in designing experiences in SaaS for the past 3 years. I navigate through technical conversations with developers and stakeholders with the knowledge I’ve picked up over the years, interacting with engineer friend circle. However I’m not satisfied by my knowledge base and I want to understand the science and art of building software from the very basics. Please share any resources that can help me start, may it be books, articles or anything else.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to learn software fundamentals as an architect turned UX designer?
